## tria2 variable

Applies the quotation to `u v`<!-- -->, then to `w x`<!-- -->, and then to `y z`<!-- -->.

( u v w x y z q -- quv qwx qyz )

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tria2: import("./api").StackFn
```
